DOC.brief_title: Acute Psychological Effects High Intensity Exercise With Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: We examine acute effect one high intensity session physical exercise ( 4x4 interval ) psychological variable state mood , state anxiety , well-being psychological distress . This possible effect examine three group , one group main group two group compare . Group 1 : Patients schizophrenia psychotic illness . Group 2 : people non-psychotic diagnosis . Group 3 : people without psychological diagnosis .
